TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void LoadItemsEventHandler(object sender, LoadItemsEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed LoadItemsEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub LoadItemsEventHandler(sender As Object, e As LoadItemsEventArgs)
public delegate void LoadItemsEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, LoadItemsEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: The source of the event, a control.

param.name: e
param.span: 包含事件数据的 对象。

span.span: A object that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示将处理 控件的 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a control.

summary.span: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 网站。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列表控件包含项的集合。A list control contains a collection of items. 这些项属于类。These items are of the class. 提供默认呈现时，表示列表控件通过其属性。When providing default rendering, the list control represents a by its property. 在模板化呈现时，模板可以呈现的任何所需的属性或关联的数据绑定对象。In templated rendering, the template can render any desired property of a or associated data-bound object. 如果项被数据绑定到对象，引发事件。If an item is data-bound to a object, the event is raised. 此时，该处理程序可以设置的属性从任意表达式的对象。At this time, the handler can set properties of the object from arbitrary expressions. 当你创建委托控件，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate for a control, you identify the method that will handle the event. 控件生成项事件时通知该处理程序。The control notifies the handler when an item event is generated. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时都会调用事件处理程序。Unless you remove the delegate, the event handler is called whenever the event occurs.
